original_title: La notte americana del Dottor Fulci
overview: A testament of the greta B-movie director Lucio Fulci, whose films inspired great director like Quentin Tarantino. Lucio Fulci gift a long meditation about moviemaking fascinating for his sincerity, irony e clearness, about his filmmaking and his particular career.
title: The American Night of Dr. Lucio Fulci
